articles.title: Sleeping Black Hole Erupts in Real Time – Blasting Out Record-Breaking X-Rays - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A mysterious black hole in a distant galaxy just woke up after decades of silence—and it’s putting on a cosmic light show! ESA’s XMM-Newton and other X-ray telescopes are capturing massive bursts of energy known as quasiperiodic eruptions (QPEs) that defy cur…
articles.content:
This artist’s impression illustrates the mechanism that could be at the origin of the powerful bursts of X-ray light seen from a newly awakened black hole named Ansky. Credit: ESA

articles.title: Shocking Spherules on Mars: NASA’s Perseverance Rover Finds a Rock That Defies Explanation - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Perseverance just stumbled upon one of Mars’ weirdest rocks yet—a formation covered in dark, spherical shapes with mysterious textures that have scientists buzzing. While similar Martian spheres have been seen before, this one, dubbed “St. Pauls Bay,” stands …
